Title: The Moment of Truth
Writer: Pedro Beltrán (screenplay), Pedro Beltrán (story), Ricardo Muñoz Suay (screenplay), Ricardo Muñoz Suay (story), Pere Portabella (screenplay), Pere Portabella (story), Francesco Rosi (screenplay), Francesco Rosi (story)
Actors: Miguel Mateo 'Miguelín', José Gómez Sevillano, Pedro Basauri 'Pedrucho', Linda Christian
Plot: The rise and fall of a famous torero, Miguelin, inside and outside of the bullfighters ring.
